attributes.action: ensure all, without exception, are subjected to tax on the excess over the Pensions Life Time Allowance, including those that are not currently subject to such tax, i.e. ex: Prime Ministers, ex Ministers and retired Judges.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Pension Life Time Allowance should equally apply to all, if they are to be applied at all, and ex: Prime Ministers, Ministers and Judges should not be exempt as they are now.

There is no justification whatsoever for such an excemption to exist. What is applied to us that are ruled should apply to those that govern us and uphold the law.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
